cause.description:
In order to reach our maximum potenial, utilize our research energies, give the chance to our bright future scientists to arise as world-class researchers, scientists, inventors and technology leaders, We need to have world-class public libraries, a place where we can work, study, conduct research on both the individual and group level. We miss the space of reading a good book, novel, research paper in our lives. How many of us attended a book review discussion. All of us hate to work in the university's poor library, hate to work individually. THEN WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR !! Public World-Class resourceful libraries.
1. Establish Public Libraries
2. Promote for Reading
3. Gain Access to the Electronic Libraries of the world's best research publishing organization i.e. IEEE, ASME, API, Wiley, Thomson, Prentice Hall,.... etc
cause.mission: Convey our sound, call for support, demand for right, dream for leadership and reach our potential
cause.name: Support for World-Class Public Scientific Research Libraries in Cairo
